document.full_text: scientists have managed to erase memories in common marine snails, a finding that could lead to new treatments for human victims of post-traumatic stress disorder, the researchers said on tuesday.
document.title: snail memory study offers hope to trauma victims
lines_and_colors: scientists have managed to erase memories in common marine snails, a finding that could lead to new treatments for human victims of post-traumatic stress disorder, the researchers said on tuesday.
